<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/license"}
  context={"endpoint"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Obtains the status of the current Camunda license

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={"Body"} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    "200": {
      description: "Obtains the current status of the Camunda license",
      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            description: "The response of a license request.",
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              validLicense: {
                description:
                  "True if the Camunda license is valid, false if otherwise",
                type: "boolean",
                nullable: false,
              },
              licenseType: {
                description:
                  "Will return the license type property of the Camunda license",
                type: "string",
              },
            },
            title: "LicenseResponse",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
